name: DOCTOR_FEEDBACK_MAGIC_LINK_TEXT_IN
message:
%greeting%, Hope you're feeling better! Please write a feedback for %doctor_name% by clicking this link. {{link}}
Your feedback will help lakhs of patients in %practice_city% make an informed choice.
